price: 49. Geef door aan Mijn dienaren dat waarlijk Ik de meest Vergevende, de Genadevolle ben.
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
